member.name: T:BoggleServerTest.BoggleServerTest
member.summary: BoggleServerTest class attempts to test functionality of BoggleServer. It also tests individual methods from class Game. Our partnership acheived a very close to 100 percentage by testing with TelNet. We are confident that our code's functionality is that of the assignment description. We just ran out of time to complete UI Tests. We hope that simply running out of time to write these test (although they would pass) won't dig too much of our grade on this assignment. Like we said, the code functions almost perfectly...
